text: Ok thank you, will give it a try

Does anyone know how to get all the properties for a line item, when I try to add a line item via the API I don't know what other names for example a custom property of a line item or "unit price". Any help is appreciated.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          `const CreateLineItem = async (Product) => {`
    `const requestData = [`
      `{`
        `name: "hs_product_id",`
        `value: Product.objectid,`
      `},`
      `{`
        `name: "quantity",`
        `value: Product.quantity,`
      `}];`
